overview:
Brian’s enthusiasm is contagious. As a founder and former CEO of Q1 Labs, Brian lined up over $34.4 million USD of venture capital financing and was the driving force behind the company’s early sales successes. While at the helm Brian drove Q1 to impressive heights as one of North Americas’ leading providers of Network Anomaly Detection Systems.

Q1 Labs has been positioned by Gartner, Inc. in the Leaders Quadrant of the 2009 Magic Quadrant for Security Information and Event Management (SIEM). The company has over 500 customers worldwide including healthcare providers, energy firms, retail organizations, utility companies, financial institutions, government agencies, and universities, among others.
